name: lovdata-assistent
description: Lovdata Assistant - Fullstack application for legal search and answers

scripts.build: cd backend && NODE_ENV=development npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && NODE_ENV=development npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p public && cp -r frontend/dist/* public/ && test -f frontend/dist/vite.svg && cp frontend/dist/vite.svg public/vite.svg || true
scripts.install:all: cd backend && NODE_ENV=development npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
